title: China calls for Canada human rights inquiry, preempting demand for investigation into abuse of Uyghurs
content:
1. China calls for Canada human rights inquiry, preempting demand for investigation into abuse of Uyghurs  The Washington Post
  2. China repudiates allegations of human rights violations in Xinjiang  CGTN
  3. UN warns of worst ‘cascade of human rights setbacks in our lifetimes’  The Guardian
  4. China doesn't need 'external care' on human rights: Global Times editorial  Global Times
  5. Is the real reason the US is so interested in what’s going on in Xinjiang because it contains so much oil?  RT
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: 中国、カナダに人権調査を要請 ウイグル人虐待の調査要求を先取り
中国呼吁加拿大进行人权调查，抢先要求对虐待维吾尔人的行为进行调查
